settings.label: Settings
settings.comment: Note: Don't forget to set-up in the Merchant Backoffice a Control URL to 'http://www.yourdomain.com/cgp/standard/control/'.

test_mode.label: Test/Live Mode
test_mode.comment: Switching between test and live mode. If you don't have an account sign up here.

site_id.label: Site ID
site_id.comment: Fill in you site ID number. You can find your site ID number at merchant back-office.

hash_key.label: Hash Key
hash_key.comment: Fill in you secret hash key for the site. You can create your hash key code at merchant back-office.

api_id.label: RESTful API Username
api_id.comment: Needed only for refund-functionality: Fill in your API Username.

api_key.label: RESTful API Key
api_key.comment: Needed only for refund-functionality: Fill in your secret API key. Please contact your account manager to retrieve the API Username and Key for your account.

use_backoffice_urls.label: Use back-office URLs
use_backoffice_urls.comment: Use the return URLs as filled in at merchant back-office instead of the default plugin values.

orderemail_at_payment.label: Send Order Email only at payment
orderemail_at_payment.comment: Send Order Email only after payment completion.

mail_invoice.label: Mail invoice to customer
mail_invoice.comment: Automatically mail invoices to a customer.

lang.label: Gateway language
lang.comment: Setting a default language interface of the gateway.

order_description.label: Order description
order_description.comment:
Payment description that will be shown to the customer in the gateway screen.
Variables: %id% = Order ID

debug.label: Debug
debug.comment: Will log details for debugging purposes in /var/log/cardgateplus.log file.

guest_template.label: New Order Confirmation Template for Guest
